<h3 id="X9589">X(9589)&nbsp;=&nbsp;EXSIMILCENTER OF THESE CIRCLES: BEVAN AND 1ST STEINER</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^3*(a+b+c)-(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a^2-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2 : :
<br>
<b>
X(9589) = 4*X(5)-3*X(40)
</b>
<p>X(9589) lies on these lines: {1,7}, {2,5493}, {4,3679}, {5,40}, {10,3832}, {11,5128}, {30,7982}, {43,9569}, {65,9580}, {78,5180}, {165,631}, {329,4882}, {354,5586}, {355,3853}, {382,517}, {484,6943}, {497,3339}, {515,3633}, {519,3146}, {529,3680}, {546,3654}, {548,3576}, {550,3656}, {551,3522}, {1158,5536}, {1479,2093}, {1572,7765}, {1695,9568}, {1697,1836}, {1709,6763}, {1750,5758}, {1906,7713}, {3057,9579}, {3062,8001}, {3149,5537}, {3241,5059}, {3303,4654}, {3340,6284}, {3361,3474}, {3526,3579}, {3528,5603}, {3529,5882}, {3530,5886}, {3543,4677}, {3582,6890}, {3746,7580}, {3813,3928}, {3817,7486}, {3828,5068}, {3843,5587}, {3855,5657}, {3861,5690}, {3901,6001}, {4197,5250}, {4848,5225}, {4857,6836}, {5045,5918}, {5067,6684}, {5082,5223}, {5234,5698}, {5259,5584}, {5270,6925}, {5288,8158}, {5541,5812}, {5692,7957}, {5715,6937}, {5762,6766}, {5842,7971}, {5850,6764}, {6048,9535}, {6282,6885}, {7354,7962}</p>
<p>
X(9589) = anticomplement of X(5493)<br>
X(9589) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1,962), (20,4301), (3529,5882), (3632,5691), (4677,3543), (5881,382), (6361,946), (7991,4)<br>X(9589) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,4312,4355), (4,7991,3679), (5,40,9588), (5,9588,1698), (20,962,4301), (20,4301,1), (40,1699,1698), (165,946,3624), (382,5881,5691), (390,3671,1), (1697,1836,5290), (1699,9588,5), (3600,4342,1)<br></p>
